title: Number of expressways gas stations , by provider in France 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of gas stations for 9 number of Companys.
The Number of gas stations is appeared to be the highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
The Number of gas stations of Company Dyneff is 15.12% smaller than the maximum value at Total.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
Company Total has the highest Number of gas stations and Dyneff has the lowest Number of gas stations.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of gas stations for 9 number of Companys.
The Number of gas stations is appeared to be the highest at Company Total and lowest at Company Dyneff.
The Number of gas stations of Company Dyneff is 15.12% smaller than the maximum value at Total.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of gas stations for 9 number of Companys.
The maximum Number of gas stations 121.0 is found at Company Total and the minimum is found at Dyneff where Company is 8.0.
The maximum Company Total has got 15.12 times higher Number of gas stations than the minimum Company Dyneff.
The Company Total has the highest Number of gas stations, followed by Avia, and Shell. Down to the Company Dyneff which is the lowest.
Company Eni, and Esso have the same Number of gas stations.
The Company Dyneff has 2.46 times less Number of gas stations than average.
